name: MTV's Celebrity Deathmatch
description:
MTV's Celebrity Deathmatch is an arcade-fighting game developed by Big Ape Productions. It came out on 01-10-2003. Global Star Software published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play MTV's Celebrity Deathmatch on PC.
It was directed by Andrew Horne (2006–07), Eric Fogel, Eric Fogel (1998–2002) and Jack Fletcher. Alan Elliot and Eric Perlmutter scored the game.
